title: West Bengal Assembly Elections 2021: Ex-CEC T S Krishnamurthy pitches for single-phase elections - The Economic Times
description: T S Krishnamurthy said public and road rallies during elections cannot be banned but the Election Commission of India (ECI) can seriously consider substantially curtailing the time and the number of days for holding such meetings as there are now alternative methods of campaigning such as digital and social media.

title: News updates from HT: Vajpayee’s niece Karuna Shukla dies of Covid-19, and all the latest news
description: Here are today’s top news, analysis and opinion. Know all about the latest news and other news updates from Hindustan Times.

description: Thunderstorms are often linked with warm temperatures, as they form when warm, moist air rises into cold air. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com

title: Fourth candidate dies of Covid ahead of last phase polls in West Bengal
description: Samir Ghosh, 42, was an independent candidate from Baisnabnagar in Malda district, which is scheduled to go to the polls in the last and eighth phase of staggered polling on Thursday

title: West Bengal posts record single-day jump of 15,889 covid cases, 57 more deaths
description: West Bengal on Sunday registered its highest single-day spike of 15,889 COVID-19 cases pushing the tally to 7,43,950, the bulletin issued by the state health department said.

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been accused of downplaying the country’s response to the pandemic, which has killed more than 195,000 people.

title: West Bengal logs 15,992 new COVID cases in last 24 hrs, highest so far

title: Covid-19 exposed populist leaders like Modi and Trump
description: Among its deadly properties, Covid-19 appears perfectly engineered to destroy the houses of sand built by populist leaders.

title: Red Volunteers Swing to Action as West Bengal Faces Covid Crisis with 15,889 New Cases | NewsClick
description: The daily infections in Bengal has more than doubled in less than 15 days as the healthcare system struggles to keep up.

title: Amid Covid-19 concerns, crèche facility aids Bengal women poll officials
description: In all, eight temporary crèches were set up in four of the nine constituencies going to polls on April 22 for the children of women polling personnel to reduce the risk of transmission of Covid-19 to the children while allowing their mothers to work more freely

title: BJP Bengal candidate Parno Mittra tests positive for Covid-19
description: Parno Mittra is among the slew of candidates, cutting across party lines, to be diagnosed with Covid-19 amid the West Bengal assembly elections.

title: Rahul Gandhi says all countrymen should get Covid-19 vaccine for free
description: "Enough of discussion. Countrymen should get the vaccine free. Do not make India the victim of the BJP system," Congress leader Rahul Gandhi tweeted.

title: India's cumulative vaccination coverage exceeds 14.19 crore in 100 days: Govt
description: The vaccination drive, which was launched by the central government on January 16, completed its 100 days on Sunday

title: UPDATE 7-India sends army to help hospitals hit by COVID-19 as countries promise aid
description: India ordered its armed forces on Monday to help tackle surging new coronavirus infections that are overwhelming hospitals, as countries including Britain, Germany and the United States pledged to send urgent medical aid.  In a meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the Chief of Defence Staff General Bipin Rawat said oxygen would be released to hospitals from armed forces reserves and retired medical military personnel would join COVID-19 health facilities.

description: India's catastrophic second covid wave shows no sign of slowing

title: West Bengal sees highest surge in Covid-19 tally in a month
description: West Bengal witnessed the highest surge in Covid-19 tally in a month by reporting 14,281 new cases on Saturday. Kolkata alone accounted for 2,970.

title: West Bengal: SpiceJet makes negative Covid report must for flyers from 8 states
description: SpiceJet adds that the negative Covid report needs to be from an ICMR-approved lab issued within 72 hours from swab collection

title: 56-year-old COVID-19 patient jumps from hospital roof to end life
description: A 56-year-old COVID-19 patient jumped from the fourth floor of a hospital in West Bengal and ended his life.

title: West Bengal Assembly Elections | One more candidate succumbs to COVID-19
description: State registers a record 15,889 new infections, 57 deaths in the past 24 hours

title: Babul Supriyo tests positive for COVID-19 for second time ahead of West Bengal Phase 7 polls
description: Taking it to Twitter, Union Minister Babul Supriyo wrote, "Both me and my wife have tested positive. Me for the 2nd time!"

title: COVID-19: West Bengal border districts on high alert
description: Collector Vineet Bharadwaj said as many as 44 quarantine centres have already been activated and more will be added depending on the situation.

title: COVID-19: West Bengal Govt issues guidelines on the supply of Remdesivir
description: with Remdesivir getting approval for emergency usage for COVID-19 patients, West bengal health department on Saturday asked nursing homes and hospitals not to give a prescription for the drug to a patient but to arrange it for them. The department also said that the drug should only be supplied to hospitals by the manufacturing companies or their vendors and cannot be sold to patients.

title: West Bengal: Panel asks private hosps to sanction 60% beds for Covid patients
description: The hospitals which have already designated 60% of their bed strength to treat coronavirus patients should not reduce them.The state on Saturday registered the highest single-day spike of 14,281 Covid-19 cases pushing the tally to 7,28,061

title: Highlights: West Bengal logs 14,281 fresh Covid-19 cases in last 24 hours

title: Election Commission tells West Bengal officials to step up action against Covid-19 violations
description: In a meeting called by chief election commissioner Sushil Chandra and election commissioner Rajiv Kumar with the state chief secretary, secretaries of Disaster Management and Health and the chief electoral officer of West Bengal, the poll panel asked official machinery ‘to step up its assigned statutory duty.

title: India Scrambles to Supply Oxygen as Covid-19 Patients Gasp for Breath
description: The Supreme Court ordered the government of Prime Minister Narendra Modi to come up with a national oxygen distribution plan as coronavirus cases continue to set records.

title: West Bengal & Tamil Nadu announce free COVID vaccines to 18+; join eight other states
description: As India prepares to vaccinate 18+, Tamil Nadu and Bengal joined 8 other state govts in announcing free COVID vaccines for all those above 18 yrs on Thursday

title: In highest single-day spike, Bengal reports 10,784 new Covid cases, 58 deaths
description: In a day, 5,616 patients were cured of the disease in the state, and the recovery rate stands at 89.23%.West Bengal now has 63,496 active cases

title: West Bengal: COVID-19 patient found dead in sitting position in hospital, family alleges negligence
description: The patient's family claimed that no doctor attended him since he was admitted to the hospital on Tuesday and he was not administered oxygen.

description: Chowdhury, who is one of the key campaigners of the Congress-ISF-Left alliance in the ongoing assembly elections, said he would continue to campaign through virtual platforms.

title: Price of West Bengal poll campaign: Covid cases rise 1500% in a month – ThePrint
description: ThePrint looks at some of the worst-affected districts from different phases of West Bengal elections to see which events may have led to the steepening of the Covid curve.

title: Summer vacations in West Bengal schools begin from today amid Covid-19 surge
description: Summer vacations in West Bengal schools have commenced from today, April 20, in view of the rise in Covid-19 cases across the state.

title: COVID-19 in Bengal: Mamata Banerjee will not campaign in Kolkata anymore, confirms party
description: It was also confirmed that the Trinamool Congress (TMC) supremo will hold election rallies in other districts for a maximum duration of 30 minutes only.

title: West Bengal records highest single-day spike with 8,419 new COVID-19 cases
description: The state of West Bengal recorded the highest single-day spike with 8,419 new COVID-19 cases. According to a report, at least 28 fresh fatalities have pushed the death toll to 10,568 in West Bengal.
